project.description: Invoke this job on a change branch prior to issuing a pull request if you suspect the branch will cause a content change to one or more rpm or debian installalers. This will generate temporary installers and update the expected package content files and merge the changes back into a new "<branch-name>-new-packaging" branch. You could then look at the new branch and if the changes are acceptable you can issue a pull request on this new branch.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: Branch
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Git branch to clone and modify with packaging changes. Must be a branch in MDSplus/mdsplus repository. It cannot be alpha or stable branches.
